content.text:
# Fujiwara no Masatada

was a Japanese poet. He was the first son of Fujiwara no Kanesuke, among the Thirty-six Poetry Immortals and the grandfather of Murasaki Shikibu. Kiyotada was his younger brother. He married a daughter of Fujiwara no Sadakata; their children include Tameyori and Tametoki, the father of Murasaki. He was also acquainted with Ki no Tsurayuki.
References
External links
* [http://www.asahi-net.or.jp/~sg2h-ymst/yamatouta/sennin/masatada.html the profile and e-text of his poems] in Japanese.
